name: Forbidden Swamp
description:
Deep in the damp paths of the Forbidden Swamp stands a huge tree. Recently, a plague of beetles periodically pours from the large hole in the tree's side, ravishing the crops in the area. Additionally, the town cleric has disappeared into the swamp some time ago. 

What happened to the town cleric and what is causing the plague of beetles? Only you can discover!

  • 8 pages (including covers)
  • 9 points of interest
  • Encounter tables
  • Strange Relics
  • Map of the Great Oak
  • Loosely built for 5e.

Get this zine and my past publications for $3/mo over at the Brooklet Games Patreon. For $12/mo you can also get a printed zine monthly! Both tiers come with:

  • Monthly adventures 
  • Monthly maps
  • Commercial Art
  • Library of past adventures, magic items, and commercial art.
